nodes.bodyText:
What do you think about creating  TestMobExportSnapshotAdjunct? With this extraction testExportRetry and testExportFailure will not run for Mob.
Similarly, TestSecureExportSnapshot will not run for retry and failure cases.

Yeah, thought about that and figured the two tests that I'd moved out, the retry on failure and extra failures check, didn't necessarily need a mob exercising (security on the other hand might make sense...). Let me put up a follow-on for these. Current state causes local test runs to fail.
